Nerangs.ab: ud aṣ̌əm vōhū ĪĪĪ frauuarāne tā sar frasastaiiaca ahurahe mazdå raēuuatō *xᵛarənaŋhatō xšnaoθra tā mraotū
"He should rectire three aṣ̌əm vohū and frauuarāne up to the end frasastaiiaca ahurahe mazdå raēuuatō *xᵛarənaŋhatō xšnaoθra up to mraotū."
digar ān vars az ḫalqe bāz konand se bār b-āb-e pādyāvi bešuyand digar xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vōhū se frauuarāne gāh ānče bid ahurahe mazdā̊.

"They unwind again the vars from the ring and wash it three times with pādyāvi-water. Then, he should recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs and the frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh (and with šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊."
